workExperience.description: Collaborated closely with physicians and clinical pharmacists to understand real-world treatment practices and medication usage in cardiology and immunology. Gained exposure to clinical trial data and learned to effectively communicate pharmacological mechanisms and indications to healthcare professionals. Developed a deep understanding of physician decision-making and evidence-based prescribing behaviors.

Participated in a consulting project for a biotech company focused on oncology therapeutics. Contributed medical insights during policy analysis and treatment landscape reviews. Gained exposure to real-world challenges in cancer care delivery, including patient access, clinical pathways, and the role of physicians in treatment decision-making.

workExperience.projectName: Clinical Rotations - Internal Medicine and Surgery
workExperience.description: Completed clinical rotations in internal medicine, surgery, and pediatrics. Gained hands-on experience in taking patient histories, writing medical records, and observing clinical procedures. Improved clinical judgment and communication skills through participation in daily ward rounds and interdisciplinary discussions.

projectExperience.description: Led a team to develop an AI-based screening model for diabetic retinopathy. Presented at the University Innovation Forum and received an Excellent Project Award.
First-author publication on GLP-1 receptor agonists and insulin resistance in the Chinese Journal of Endocrinology. Gained experience in clinical data interpretation and evidence-based writing.

education.description: Received systematic training in clinical medicine, with coursework in Pathology, Pharmacology, Internal Medicine, Surgery, and Evidence-Based Medicine. GPA: 3.8/4.0
